posts.post_title: FS: Pinkertons, Plank & Baker SGC graded
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David Levin
I have two pinkertons for sale: 

Plank and Baker, both SGC 10 because of a Tack Hole in each one.
Check the images they are beauties!

I have them up on my site, each has its own page with large images of the front and back shown in the sgc10 holders.


Plank, best offer over $2,000
Baker, best offer over $1,000

Here are images below, but the full page for each are at:

[URL="http://www.gfg.com/baseball/baker.shtml"]https://www.gfg.com/baseball/baker.shtml[/URL]
